languages.text: "Теодора фон Валанциус заслуживает большего! Объявите год скорби".
"Theodora von Valancius deserves more than that! You will declare a full year of mourning."
languages.original_text: "Теодора фон Валанциус заслуживает большего! Объявите год скорби".

traits.locale_text: "Theodora von Valancius deserves better! You will declare a full year of mourning."
"Theodora von Valancius deserves better! You will declare a full year of mourning."
"Theodora von Valancius deserves more than that! You will declare a full year of mourning."

languages.text: “西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯理当应该得到的待遇不止于此！宣布哀悼一整年。”
languages.original_text: "Theodora von Valancius deserves more than that! You will declare a full year of mourning."

traits.locale_text: “西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯理当应该得到的待遇不止于此！宣布哀悼一整年。”

languages.text: «¡Theodora von Valancius merece mucho más! Decretará un año entero de luto».
languages.original_text: "Theodora von Valancius deserves more than that! You will declare a full year of mourning."

traits.locale_text: «¡Theodora von Valancius merece mucho más! Decretará un año entero de luto».

languages.text: 「テオドラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスはそれ以上の偉業を成し遂げた！一年間、喪に服すことを宣言するといい」
languages.original_text: "Theodora von Valancius deserves more than that! You will declare a full year of mourning."

traits.locale_text: 「テオドラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスはそれ以上の偉業を成し遂げた！一年間、喪に服すことを宣言するといい」

languages.text: "Theodora von Valancius verdient mehr als das! Ihr werdet ein ganzes Jahr der Trauer anberaumen."
languages.original_text: "Theodora von Valancius deserves more than that! You will declare a full year of mourning."

traits.locale_text: "Theodora von Valancius verdient mehr als das! Ihr werdet ein ganzes Jahr der Trauer anberaumen."

languages.text: « Théodora von Valancius mérite bien plus que six mois ! Vous allez déclarer une année de deuil complète. »
languages.original_text: "Theodora von Valancius deserves more than that! You will declare a full year of mourning."

traits.locale_text: « Théodora von Valancius mérite bien plus que six mois ! Vous allez déclarer une année de deuil complète. »

languages.text: "Theodora von Valancius, bundan fazlasını hak ediyor! Bir yıl sürecek bir yas ilan edeceksin."
languages.original_text: "Theodora von Valancius deserves more than that! You will declare a full year of mourning."

traits.locale_text: "Theodora von Valancius bundan daha fazlasını hak ediyor! Tüm yıl süren bir yas ilan edeceksin."
